statements: DELETE FROM social_media_sentiments WHERE user_id = 100 AND post_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM social_media_sentiments WHERE id = 1 AND user_id = 100;
DELETE FROM social_media_sentiments WHERE post_date < '2022-01-01' AND sentiment_score > 0.5;
DELETE FROM social_media_data WHERE id = 10 AND sentiment_analysis < 0.5;
DELETE FROM consumer_preferences WHERE user_id = 100 AND product_id IN (1, 2, 3);
DELETE FROM ConsumerPreferences WHERE user_id = 100 AND preference_score > 0.8;
DELETE FROM user_demographics WHERE gender = 'Male' AND location = 'New York';
